title: Etihad Airways expects to return to profitability in 2023: executive
text:
Etihad Airways expects to return to profitability in 2023: executive

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Oct 08, 2019 03:31AM ET)

ABU DHABI (Reuters) - Abu Dhabi-based Etihad Airways expects to return to profitability in 2023, at the end of a five-year turnaround plan, its chief commercial officer, Robin Kamark, said on Wednesday. Etihad suffered from its third consecutive year of annual losses in 2018 despite cost savings of nearly half a billion dollars as it cut its workforce and fleet. Kamark told reporters on the sidelines of an aviation conference in Abu Dhabi that Etihad has taken delivery of two Airbus A-350-1000 aircraft.

Etihad Airways expects to return to profitability in 2023: executive
